item.title: Connecting to MAMP install of MySQL in R
item.description: I just purchased a used Macbook Pro to learn a little web development, bash, and other Linux-type things, and in the course of doing some tutorials (namely Tania Rasciaâ€™s great post on building a simple CRUD app) I had to install MAMP.
